page.title: 20Food for Thought
page.content: Most people enjoy a good sweet now and again.In Carnoustie our survey showed that{Mars Bars}were the most popular sweets.No-one at all seemed to enjoy a{Wispa.}Number 2 in the sweets charts were{Marathon Bars,}followed by {Opal Fruits. All the shops which were interviewed said that a great deal of money is made by selling sweets. Despite all this confectionary which is sold and eaten in Carnoustie,only one child in a week goes to the {dietician}(someone who helps you to understand the food you eat),at the local health-centre.However the number of babies who attend is much greater. It is recommended that children should not eat sweets between meals. However,if they must have something the dietician recommends{crisps}rather than sweets.
